trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Goleta
There were no other sightings in Goleta on or around April 8th 2010
Summary: Bright Star-like object glideing in the sky
divs: Sighting DetailsI was going to work it was about 5:50 am. I always look up at the sky when I walk to my car. I noticed a big BRIGHT star like object gliding in the sky. It was very quiet outside and this thing was making NO noise. It didn't move like a plane it was floating in a way, and looked weightless. It started out looking really bright then as the seconds went by it started to dim then I could see it anymore. I did get my cell phone to try an get a picture but even tho it was really bright I couldn't get it on my phone. I have a pretty good phone it takes really good pics and I havnt had this problem before.
